thread.section_title: Shipito Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shipito | www.shipito.com
thread.title: Berta de Kobe
thread.title_full: Shipito reviewed by Berta de Kobe

author: Berta de Kobe
title: Berta de Kobe
text: Avoid this company like the plague. One day Shipito company was a great for parcel fowarding, but the last few weeks the service has dropped to an all time low. You could nowadays even be thankful if they send out your package from the USA to abroad, but you have to be aware that the changes are high you will receive the package completely destroyed!! W.T.F. has happened to this company They simply dont care when you call them, they have become absolute monsters They dont even pick up the phone.
